desc: Have you tried a soy scented candle from Pretty Frank? They're handcrafted in Sydney using earth-loving ingredients and quality vegan-friendly components. Enjoy strong scent throw and long lasting candles. Try the greener option today. Learn more here!

layout.text: Candles that burn for good, because quite frankly, we should.
Green-as-you-can-get candles. One tree planted with every order.
